A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Finally got around to watching this on Redbox. I didn't understand the backlash\, surely it couldn't be that bad. It was. The cinematography was gorgeous\, but the story distracted from it. I didn't bother seeing this in the theater due to my disappointment with \"The Force Awakens.\" I won't bother watching the next one at all ... not even six months later on Redbox.
